segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number.
DTM, A segment to indicate a date and/or time applying to the whole message, such as date and time of document or message issue.
FTX, A segment to specify free format supplementary information: - change information - additional remarks

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference relating to the whole message, and its date and/or time.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference relating to the whole message, such as: - reference to previous message
DTM, A segment to indicate date and/or time related to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a name and address of a party, such as: - message sender - message recipient - ordering customer/principal - ordering customer agent

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department for the party, such as: - information contact
COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify details of the departing means of transport.

segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the transport details of the departing vessel, such as voyage number or an indication of the transport method.
DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the departure of the means of transport.
RFF, A segment to identify a relevant reference number, such as: - voyage number

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify a place or port of call of the conveyance.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify a place or port of call of the means of transport or conveyance, such as: - Maritime Mobile Ship Identifier (MMSI number)
DTM, A segment to specify date(s) and time(s) related to a location.
MEA, A segment to specify a measurement related to the means of transport, such as: - gross tonnage (of the vessel)

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify total numbers.

segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the actual number of segments in the message and the control reference number of the message.
FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the actual number of operations on equipment.
